WITH UserBorrowedBooks AS ( SELECT book_id FROM tb_borrow WHERE user_id = #{userId} ),
OtherUsers AS ( SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM tb_borrow WHERE book_id IN (SELECT book_id FROM UserBorrowedBooks) AND user_id != #{userId} ),
RecommendedBooks AS ( SELECT DISTINCT book_id FROM tb_borrow WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM OtherUsers) AND book_id NOT IN (SELECT book_id FROM UserBorrowedBooks) ) SELECT b.* FROM tb_book b WHERE b.id IN (SELECT book_id FROM RecommendedBooks)
